original_title: Best of Tromadance Film Festival: Volume 5
overview: Compilation of the Best and Most Outrageous Short Films From the World's Finest Film Festival! Includes: P.S. I'm Spaceface, The Amnesia Party, The Misled Romance of Cannibal Girl and Incest Boy, Bum Runner plus MANY MORE!
tagline: The Best and Most Outrageous Short Films!
title: Best of Tromadance Film Festival: Volume 5
